AMSTERDAM_B-LOC 1996-08-24_O
Dutch_B-MISC champions_O Ajax_B-ORG Amsterdam_I-ORG *OOV*_O in_O their_O second_O league_O match_O of_O the_O season_O on_O Saturday_O losing_O 2-0_O away_O at_O Heerenveen_B-ORG ._O
Ajax_B-ORG ,_O who_O had_O a_O dismal_O series_O of_O pre-season_O results_O before_O beating_O NAC_B-ORG of_O Breda_B-LOC in_O their_O opening_O game_O ,_O had_O the_O best_O of_O an_O entertaining_O first_O half_O but_O failed_O to_O break_O the_O *OOV*_O ._O
Eight_O minutes_O after_O the_O *OOV*_O ,_O Heerenveen_B-ORG 's_O *OOV*_B-PER Wouden_I-PER broke_O through_O the_O Amsterdam_B-LOC defence_O ,_O left_O defender_O John_B-PER Veldman_I-PER standing_O and_O *OOV*_O the_O ball_O beyond_O goalkeeper_O *OOV*_B-PER van_I-PER der_I-PER Sar_I-PER into_O the_O Ajax_B-ORG net_O ._O
Ajax_B-ORG ,_O without_O injured_O defenders_O *OOV*_B-PER Santos_I-PER and_O *OOV*_B-PER *OOV*_I-PER and_O strikers_O *OOV*_B-PER *OOV*_I-PER and_O Marc_B-PER *OOV*_I-PER ,_O then_O stepped_O up_O the_O pace_O and_O looked_O certain_O to_O *OOV*_O ._O
